QuestData.Title: The Late William Allerton
QuestData.Description: William's neck has been cut by a sharp object.$B$BFurther inspection reveals a single clue to bring to Leryssa - an enlistment card bearing the name of William Allerton.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Enlistment Card to Leryssa at Valiance Keep in Borean Tundra.
QuestData.RewardText: Do you think William's death was a random killing by the Scourge? Things sure seem fishy.$B$BSomething's up. We must find Thassarian.
